Ability.Name: Shiv
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target",3409) == nil and (UnitPowerType("target") == 0 or UnitPowerType("target") == 2) then return true end

Ability.Name: Apply Poisons
Ability.Lua:
if applypoison and GetTime() - applypoison > 3 then applypoison = nil end if UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil and applypoison == nil then
local activepoisons = { "Instant Poison", "Deadly Poison", "Wound Poison" } if IsSpellKnown(36554) then activepoisons = { "Wound Poison", "Crippling Poison", "Crippling Poison" } end local _,poisonMH,_,_,poisonOH,_,_,poisonTR = GetWeaponEnchantInfo() applypoison = GetTime()
if poisonMH == nil then UseItemByName(activepoisons[1],"player") if SpellIsTargeting() then PickupInventoryItem(16) end elseif poisonOH == nil then UseItemByName(activepoisons[2],"player") if SpellIsTargeting() then PickupInventoryItem(17) end elseif poisonTR == nil then UseItemByName(activepoisons[2],"player") if SpellIsTargeting() then PickupInventoryItem(18) end end
end

Ability.Name: -- defensive spells --
Ability.Lua: if IsAltKeyDown() or IsMounted() or SpellIsTargeting() or UnitBuffID("player",1856) or UnitBuffID("player",80169) then return true end

Ability.Name: -- offensive spells --
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 97417, 97977 } local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy", "Twisted Spirit", "AmaniÂ´shi Hatcher", "Hakkar's Chains", "Exposed Head of Magmaw", "Battleground Demolisher", "Ozumat", "Right Foot", "Left Foot", "Icy Tomb", "Risen Ghoul", "Mana Void", "Burning Tendons", "Wing Tentacle", "Arm Tentacle", "Twilight Assault Drake" } local noaggromobs = nil local immunity = nil
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID("target",v) then immunity = 1 end end
for i,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName("target") == v then noaggromobs = 1 end end
if UnitIsDead("target") or immunity or IsSpellInRange("Shiv","target") == 0 or UnitCanAttack("player","target") == nil or (UnitAffectingCombat("target") == nil and noaggromobs == nil and UnitIsPlayer("target") == nil) or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 then return true end

Ability.Name: Assist Tank
Ability.Lua:
if GetNumPartyMembers() > 0 and UnitInRaid("player") == nil then
local heisthetank = nil
for i = 1, GetNumPartyMembers(), 1 do if UnitGroupRolesAssigned("party"..tostring(i)) == "TANK" then heisthetank = "party"..tostring(i) end end
if heisthetank and UnitExists("target") == nil and UnitAffectingCombat(heisthetank) and UnitAffectingCombat(heisthetank.."target") and UnitIsDead(heisthetank.."target") == nil and UnitCanAttack("player",heisthetank.."target") then TargetUnit(heisthetank.."target") end
end

Ability.Name: Tricks of the Trade
Ability.Lua:
if UnitCanAttack("player","target") and UnitIsDead("target") == nil and UnitHealth("target") > UnitHealthMax("player") and UnitName("target") ~= "Raider's Training Dummy" and UnitInRaid("player") == nil then
local InParty = GetNumPartyMembers() if InParty > 0 then for i = 1, InParty, 1 do local member = "party"..tostring(i) if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" and UnitIsDead(member) == nil then if UnitThreatSituation(member,"target") ~= 3 and UnitInRange(member) then CastSpellByID(57934,member) end end end end
end

Ability.Name: Fan of Knives
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftShiftKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Above 35 --
Ability.Lua:
local ahp = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if ahp > 35 then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Below 35 --
Ability.Lua:
local bhp = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if bhp < 35 then return true end

Ability.Name: Mutilate AB
Ability.Lua:
local mutilateCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local mutilatehealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local mypower = UnitPower("player")
if mutilateCP <= 3 and mypower >= 60 then if mutilatehealth >= 35 then return true elseif mutilatehealth <=34 and PQR_NotBehindTarget() then return true end end

Ability.Name: Mutilate BL
Ability.Lua: if PQR_NotBehindTarget() ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Stealth
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Garrote
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Slice & Dice
Ability.Lua:
local _, _, _, _, _, _, sliceanddicetimer = UnitBuffID("player", 5171)
if sliceanddicetimer == nil then return true elseif sliceanddicetimer - GetTime() < 2 and GetComboPoints("player", "target") > 2 then return true end

Ability.Name: Rupture
Ability.Lua:
local rup, _, _, _, _, _, ruptimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1943, "player") local CP = GetComboPoints("player", "target")
if rup ~= nil then if ruptimer - GetTime() < 2 and CP >= 3 then return true end else return true end

Ability.Name: Envenom
Ability.Lua:
local _, _, _, _, _, _, ruptimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1943) local _, _, _, _, _, _, sliceanddicetimer = UnitBuffID("player", 5171)
if sliceanddicetimer ~= nil and ruptimer - GetTime() >= 4 and GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 4 then return true end

Ability.Name: Backstab
Ability.Lua:
local backstabCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local backstabhealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") local mypower = UnitPower("player")
if PQR_NotBehindTarget() then return false end
if backstabCP <= 4 then if backstabhealth <= 36 then return true end end

Ability.Name: Vendeta
Ability.Lua:
local lc = UnitLevel("target")
if lc == -1 or lc >= 85 then return true end

Ability.Name: Coold Blood
Ability.Lua: if GetComboPoints("player", "target") >= 4 then return true end

Ability.Name: Vanish
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", 58426) == nil then return true end
